column1: Estimated Resident Population (Mean Quarter Ended) by Sex (1991+) (Qrtly-Mar/Jun/Sep/Dec)
Population estimates include the latest migration estimates published in the same month.
All population estimates at 30 June 2018 and beyond use the 2018-base ERP.

The current population estimates are based on 2018 Census data. The 2023-based estimated resident population will be published following the release of 2023 Census and 2023 Post-enumeration Survey results.
